 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרוּר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==pot== ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] from ***boiling***, dubious; otherwise [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 151</sup>); — ***pot*** (earthen ? see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרור‎</span> [[Eccl.13.2|Eccl 13:2]] Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">χύτρα</span>, opposed to <span class="bdbLangGreek">λέβης</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"><img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***jar of the potter***, opposed to <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"><img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), for boiling [[Num.11.8|Num 11:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.2.14|1Sam 2:14]], compare [[Judg.6.19|Judg 6:19]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">χύτρα</span>), <span class="bdbLangGreek">κύθρα</span>). II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פור‎</span> see  II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרר‎</span>.
